items.title: Netanyahu and his allies resume their war on Israel's judicial system

items.title: Israelis don't deserve opposition MK Benny Gantz
items.summary: Gantz's model would have worked had all parties set aside political rivalries and been willing to make concessions for the sake of coexistence in Israel. Since we have not gotten that, we should salute Gantz as we observe the political decline of the man who embodies our entire tragedy
